article_title: POLITICAL ENDORSEMENT: Barry Loudermilk: Return incumbent to Washington
article_text:
Marietta, GA (30060)

Today

Sun and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: U.S. Rep. Barry Loudermilk is finishing his first term representing the 11th Congressional District, a district that encompasses Bartow and Cherokee counties, as well as parts of Cobb and north
